mapper.update: update lg_etrustmentslip set vehicleNumber = #{vehiclenumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, damagedDeduction = #{damageddeduction,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, carserviceDeduction = #{carservicededuction,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, creatDate = #{creatdate,jdbcType=DATE}, wayBillId = #{waybillid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where entrustmentSlipId = #{entrustmentslipid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select entrustmentSlipId, vehicleNumber, damagedDeduction, carserviceDeduction, creatDate, wayBillId, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_etrustmentslip where entrustmentSlipId = #{entrustmentslipid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select entrustmentSlipId, vehicleNumber, damagedDeduction, carserviceDeduction, creatDate, wayBillId, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_etrustmentslip
